summary: This is an email from a Correctional Systems Officer documenting attempts to contact two officers (Thomas and Noel) for a wellness check on August 17-18, 2019. The document appears to be related to official prison or detention facility communications, possibly in the context of inmate monitoring.

persons.name: Thomas
persons.context: Officer Thomas was called twice (August 17 and 18, 2019) for a wellness check, but did not answer; messages were left.

persons.context: Officer Noel was called twice (August 17 and 18, 2019) for a wellness check, but did not answer; messages were left.
